name: Cheassecake Raisins
description:
All game assets are fully created by us, 

Game are created at Godot Engine to create asset we used Blender, SubstacePainter, Ilustrator, Photoshop, Gimp.

Main theme is building base at the same time growing a Cheese Cake that contain Raisins, but King Ciastek decided to protect his CheeseCake kingdom from Raisins that absolutly nobody likes !
Bad forces doesn't  sleep ! They want to bring back Raisins again and make our Cheese Cake a Cheese Cake with Raisins ! We can not allow that so we buld our base.
We have approximately 10 minues before Cheese Cakes Growth. We have 3 levels, each level is divided with proper amount of time that is appointed by colour of our Cheese cake surface.The longer our castel survive attack the darker surface become.
